unnormalised: Crop insurance is a lifesaver, especially here in Maharashtra. Heard so many farmers in Vidarbha benefited after the 20/07/2023 floods. My kaka, Ramrao, swears by Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana. Bureaucracy can be a pain though, like dealing with the bank on 15/08/2023! Hopefully, things improve by Diwali, say around 24/10/2024. Rs. 5000 compensation helped, but it's never enough, is it? Jai Kisan! What about the small landholders with less than 2 acres? Need better outreach, right?
normalised: Crop insurance is a lifesaver, especially here in Maharashtra. Heard so many farmers in Vidarbha benefited after the twentieth july two thousand and twenty three floods. My kaka, Ramrao, swears by Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana. Bureaucracy can be a pain though, like dealing with the bank on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three! Hopefully, things improve by Diwali, say around twenty fourth october two thousand and twenty four. Rupee five thousand compensation helped, but it's never enough, is it? Jai Kisan! What about the small landholders with less than two acres? Need better outreach, right?
